#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int trial;
    scanf("%d",&trial);
    while(trial--)
    {
                  int i,count=0;
                  char ch[100];
                  scanf("%s",ch);
                  for(i=0;ch[i];i++)
                  count+=ch[i];
                  printf("%c\n",(count/i));
    }
    return 0;
}
